title: Aditya Birla Capital, Aditya Birla Finance announce a Scheme of Amalgamation for creation of a large NBFC
description: Aditya Birla Capital Limited (ABCL) and Aditya Birla Finance (ABFL) have approved the Scheme of Amalgamation (Scheme) to create a large unified operating NBFC. The merger will result in a reduction of legal entities and simplification of the group structure of Aditya Birla Capital. It will also comply with the Scale based Regulations of RBI, which require mandatory listing of Aditya Birla Finance by September 30, 2025.
